channel.title: Who's On First
channel.description: Who's On First is a gazetteer of all the places.

item.title: Who's On First, Chapter Two
item.description: It means that while things are not literally "better than yesterday" – since yesterday you didn't have to read this blog post – it means that things are hopefully better than the yesterday of the last time a service you came to depend on had to shutter its doors.

item.title: WOF in a Box (part 2)
item.description: Run Who's On First on your own hardware.

item.title: Updating Who's On First Neighbourhoods - Part III
item.description: Check out the most recent additions and updates to neighbourhoods in WOF!

item.title: WOF in a Box (part 1)
item.description: Run Who's On First on your own hardware.

item.title: Whos On First Updates, 2017
item.description: Outlining a few one-offs, changes, and edits that were made to Who's On First in 2017

item.title: Who's On First ꞉fist-bump꞉ OpenStreetMap
item.description: The 70s were weird like that in a way that we don’t have time to discuss today except to say that Who’s On First would like to be the bucket of water to OpenStreetMap’s giant eagle.

item.title: maîtres chez nous
item.description: Perhaps we can stop teaching our tools the bad habits of the past.

item.title: Mapzen Places is here! And there! And everywhere.
item.description: Get geometries, hierarchies, statistics and more with the Mapzen Places API.

item.title: Statoids, Mesoshapes, and Who's On First
item.description: Check out our recent additions to the Who's On First gazetteer, including our partnership with Statoids!

item.title: Increasing Name Translations in Who's On First
item.description: Outlining and visualizing the work we've done to increase name translations in the Who's On First gazetteer.
